title: Champion Mastery Leaderboards
body:
I was wondering if people thought having like a leader boards (say top 5) for people who play a certain champ the most.
I think the mastery system is really cool and fun but I think a leader board could be a cool idea.

I am suggesting this because my friend has almost 100k mastery with Janna and I was wondering If he has the most points since the mastery system was implemented.

Even if there was a monthly leader board per champ to see their total as another way to see champ popularity.

Im kinda just blowing ideas right now but does anyone have a comment or suggestion?
